TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1632-1633

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1632-1633

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Receipt for goods, April 18, 1827.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Recd from *person_mentioned*H. Fullerton*/person_mentioned*, in good order and to be delivered in like good order to *person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* at *location_mentioned*St Felipe de Austi*/location_mentioned*n the following articles to wit*/p*
*p*1 Bbl cont'g Coffee, Loaf Sugar and diverse small articles*/p* *p*1/2 " cont'g 2 Cheeses*/p* *p*3 Cans of Mackerel*/p*,
*p*The carriage of which will be paid by *person_mentioned*H. Fullerton*/person_mentioned* at this place— *location_mentioned*Baileys Landing*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="04-18-1827">18 April 1827*/date_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
